text: The St. Mary's Monastery (), also known as the Monastery of Dormition of Theotokos Mary, is a medieval Byzantine church in Zvërnec Island inside the Narta Lagoon northwest of the city of Vlorë of Southern Albania. File:Manastiri_Zverrnecit.jpg| File:Manastiri_Zverrnecit_brenda.jpg| File:Kloster Zvernec Albania 2.JPG| == See also == * Culture of Albania * Architecture of Albania * Byzantine churches in Albania == References == Category:13th-century Eastern Orthodox church buildings Category:14th-century Eastern Orthodox church buildings Category:Cultural Monuments of Albania Category:Churches in Vlorë County Category:Tourist attractions in Albania Category:Tourist attractions in Vlorë County Category:Byzantine church buildings in Albania Category:Eastern Orthodox church buildings in Albania
title: St. Mary's Monastery, Zvërnec
